Package protocol

Class ResponseFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • protocol.ResponseFactory

extends java.lang.Object
    Factory used for creating Response instances.

      • makeCheckeredFlagResponse

        public static Response makeCheckeredFlagResponse​(long raceStop)
        Make checkered flag response. Used to send raceStop time to all clients after first player finished.
        Parameters:
        raceStop - unix epoch time of race end in seconds
        Returns:
        Response
